quotes.quote: Success is always possible as long as you keep trying.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Keep getting up, keep working, keep fighting for what you want.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Wake up. Work out. Kick ass. Repeat.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your goal is so much closer than you think.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Fall down seven times, get up eight.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Everything you desire is on its way to you. Be patient; your turn is coming.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: All progress takes place outside the comfort zone.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's perseverance that's the key. It's persevering for long enough to achieve your potential.
quotes.author: Lynn Davies

quotes.quote: It's not knowledge or talent that separates successful people, but rather they're willingness to keep working.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success in life comes when you simply refuse to give up, with goals so strong that obstacles, failure, and loss only act as motivation.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Failures happen, setbacks happen, keep going because eventually victories happen, accomplishments happen.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never give up. If you really want it, then it's worth it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goals: my strength lies solely in my tenacity.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: You've been pushing yourself so hard, and now your best days are on their way. Get excited!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: All things are possible - if you never give up!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Courage doesn't always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.'
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: A rose grows through the concrete regardless of the terrain, it still pushes through. Be that rose and grow.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your body hears everything you say to it. Make sure the words you speak are encouraging and inspiring.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Delaying isn't doubting. Allow yourself time and space to wait as you work for your best future.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's never a failure if you learn something from it.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Even little steps, if taken in the right direction, are leading to your best life.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Push through for all the people that gave up on you, push through for all the obstacles that called you a failure.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Muscle requires hustle.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Time is your strongest tool. Dedicate as much of it as you can towards accomplishing your goals.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your willingness to begin again is one of your greatest strengths.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't aim for perfection. Aim for 'better than yesterday.'
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Dreams become regrets when left in the mind, never planted in the soil of action.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The more we climb a mountain, the easier it becomes. Conditioning is possible with every mountain.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You must remain focused on the life you have. Never let outside influences deter you from your purpose.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Continue to push yourself, the finish line is right there.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: More powerful than the will to win is the courage to begin.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success Recipe: 2 cups faith, 2 cups love, 1 cup hard work, 1 cup persistence, 1 tbsp vision and a dash of swagger.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Sore muscles are temporary, but success lasts forever.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Much effort, much prosperity.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The sweetest fruit you'll ever taste is the one you planted, nurtured, and picked yourself.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Ducks paddle under smooth waters. Stay unruffled, work hard, and let the results show.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Stay focused. Stay determined. Stay inspired. You've got this!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You already have what it takes to keep going and keep winning: patience, determination, and inner strength.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your journey will be hard, but the goal will be worth it, just like the calm after the storm.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Self-discipline paves the road to triumph.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Winners are not people who never fail, but people who never quit.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Write down your end goal and read it often. Remembering the big picture can help you stay on track.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Starting can be the hardest part of a journey. Just take the first step.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Keep fighting for what you want.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Your goals deserve your discipline.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Let the others sleep in. You have mountains to conquer.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Never let the fear of criticism keep you from going after your dreams with all your heart.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: If you want results, you have to also want discipline.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: One foot forward. One day at a time.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Do not give up; the beginning is always the hardest.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: You don't have to get it right the first time. You can start over as often as you need to. I know you'll succeed in the end.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: When starting over seems scary, focus on the outcome you're working towards.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Success is yours, keep striving!
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Planning and perseverance will bring your mission to fruition.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: Every day you're granted the chance to reach your goals. Get up and go get them.
quotes.author: Unknown
